message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm thinking of a price of $12000 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I can go up to $10200. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $10200, but I was thinking we could do a bit better than that. I'll counteroffer at $11500. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $10200, but $11500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10500. Can you meet me at that price?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $10500, but I'd like to try to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I'll counteroffer at $12000. I'm confident you'll find it's worth it
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, which is my absolute maximum. Can you seriously consider that?
